name: 塞莱斯特·马可纳
name_full: 塞莱斯特·马可纳 Celeste Marcone

last_movies.title: 末日巡逻队 第一季

introduction: Celeste Marcone is an actress based in the Southeast with film, television, commercial and theatrical credits to her name, including award-winning film projects, various guest roles in television, and numerous commercials. Filming on projects from the east coast to South Dakota and Nebraska, she has relished working with creative, talented and interesting people as the most rewarding part of the business. Some of her films include lead roles in the award-winning films Whatever It Is, Threshold, and Peach Cobbler, and the feature film A Small Problem. Television credits include Doom Patrol, Homicide Hunter, and Dead Silent.
